pinyin: Di4 yi1 ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4

definition: (prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: After World War I, Syria became a French mandate.
sentences.chinese: 第一次世界大战后，叙利亚成了法国的托管地。

sentences.english: It became the most successful bomber used in World War One.
sentences.chinese: 成了第一次世界大战中战功最卓著的一种轰炸机。

sentences.english: A bisexualg basebisexualngl battle was going on during the First World War.
sentences.chinese: 第一次世界大战期间，一场大战役正在举办。

sentences.english: The Air Force has studied air combat since World War I.
sentences.chinese: 美国空军自第一次世界大战以来一直在研究空战。

sentences.english: The First World War smashed this faith in reason pretty irreparably,” Schulmann said.
sentences.chinese: 第一次世界大战无法挽回地粉碎了这一理性信念。

sentences.english: It is like sterling after World War One.
sentences.chinese: 这就像是第一次世界大战后英镑一样。

sentences.english: Japan entered World War I and declared war on the Central Powers.
sentences.chinese: 日本作为轴心国参加了第一次世界大战。

sentences.english: The First World War(1914-1918) had brought him great sadness.
sentences.chinese: 第一次世界大战给他带来极大的悲伤。

sentences.english: They visited the site of first world war battle.
sentences.chinese: 他们参观了第一次世界大战役遗址。

sentences.english: This " secret was extensively used by Resident Woodrow Wilson during Worid War I ."
sentences.chinese: 第一次世界大战期间，咸尔逊总统曾大力运用本秘诀。

sentences.english: Millions of people were immolated in World War I.
sentences.chinese: 千百万的人们在第一次世界大战中被杀死。

sentences.english: A bisexualg basebwisl battle was going on during the First World War.
sentences.chinese: 第一次世界大战时候，一场大战役正在实行。

sentences.english: A bisexualg basebisl battle was going on during the First World War.
sentences.chinese: 第一次世界大战时刻，一场大战役正在举行。

sentences.english: Why did Russia withdraw from WWI in 1917?
sentences.chinese: 为什么俄罗斯在1917年从第一次世界大战退出？

sentences.english: The city was the site of the Paris Peace Conference, which ended World War I.
sentences.chinese: 第一次世界大战结束后，这里是召开巴黎和会的地方。

sentences.english: Chlorine gas was despicably used during WW1.
sentences.chinese: 氯气在第一次世界大战中被卑鄙地使用。

definition: Allies/entente (i.e. Western powers allied to China in WW1)
the war of 1904-1905 between Russia and Japan
Pacific War between Japan and the US, 1941-1945

Battle of Stalingrad (1942-1943), decisive battle of Second World War and one of the bloodiest battles in history, when the Germans failed to take Stalingrad, were then trapped and destroyed by Soviet forces
